phrases: Presented by SoulEaterFan
Presented by SoulEaterFan
Hold your breath
Deadly Night awaits us
You desired it,
the world like that
to reflect in those eyes
OOHO
Even if those dreams will be scary
For your sake, Fairy Blue
Breaking of stars
was decorated by
So do not stop believing!
As long as I am looking at
the brightly shining moon.
The NOISE is kicking around the preestablished harmony.
Flaring up and glaring at the present.
I sneak in.
That time at the GARAGE I saw a dream about unchangeable HEART.
So this day and the same tomorrow gets mixed.
I am roaring noisily around in sensibility.
My singing heart plays the BEAT.
There is definite evidence.
Hold it in your hands.
Lose it
Hold it in your hands.
Lose it
In the fading moments.
Tears have been secretly she would.
Everything
Gets revealed here.
Everything
Gets adjusted to the ordinary time.
I think that is the way it should be
Following the unclear yellow light.
Go through the darkest nights.
At that time I was too afraid.
But now I am sending off my life.
You always reflect.
In my proud heart.
We should only protect our beliefs.
Embrace them.
It starts all over everyday.
I am drowning in the raging waves.
Still have not awaken from my dream.
We are all here.
I always hear.
The voices of my fellows.
I am looking for a way to shake off the solitude.
In the winds of waiting.
I have no other way but to move forward.
I believe in the way of life.
Yeah.
Crona' s Escape
Your Smile, Please?
Cut the Cards
Medusa Surrenders to Shibusen?
I am telling you,
your mission here has already ended.
Hurry up and pack your things,
there is still a lot of things that Medusa needs your help with.
But...
I do not want to leave here.
Personally, I would love to let you stay.
But I wonder what Medusa has to say about that...
This is the first time that I have ever had friends.
If I leave now, then I will never get to see them again.
Shut up and stop acting like a cry-baby!
Just do as your told, you idiot!
It is only a matter of time before they discover what you did.
If Shinigami finds out that you made Marie swallow Medusa's snake
so that we could destroy Stein,
He will definitely crack you open with a million hits of his Direct Braining Shinigami Chop!
And that is not all,
that Maka will surely weep in sorrow.
No matter what you do, the fact that you betrayed them will never change.
Hey, get your ass out here!
We have traveled all the way here!
We would expect nothing less than a cup of tea!
Has the cold gone to your head?!
Huh?
You are talking to the Kishin,
Who do you think you are?
To him, your words are like a flea's sneeze.
Then I suppose yours would be that of a flea's fart?
What, you got a problem with that?
Arachne-sama,
please wait!
Please let us take the lead.
You stay here, I will go in alone.
Arachne-sama...
Crona's Escape: Your Smile, Please?
Kishin, Asura,
My name is Arachne,
one who worships you.
I have come for you,
would you please let me see your face?
Just like the rumors, your cowardice knows no bounds.
Are you confining yourself here to regain your power?
Or,
Are you cowering in fear from Shinigami?
Seems like you have gotten tired of hide-and-seek and have decided to show yourself.
Come here!
Threatening a helpless woman like this,
You really are a cute boy.
There you are,
I have been looking everywhere for you.
What do you want?
The time has come to purge this land of Shinigami,
I want you to fight together with me.
800 years,
that is how long I have been holding in this hatred just so that I can take my revenge on him.
I believe that is the same with you, right?
If we do not stand together, there will be no chance of winning.
Do you want to have your skin ripped off and become sealed in the darkness again?
Come, let us do this together.
Even if it costs me my life, I will always protect you.
You can feel it, right?
My heartbeat.
My heart...
will never rest until I get my revenge...
This is good!
Hey Crona,
next time, join us in the Chain Resonance training!
If you are there, I think our powers will become even stronger!
Y-Yeah...
There is no need to worry!
I would expect that much from you.
YOU-Uhh...
Here Crona,
eat as much as you want.
Sure...
Your face is ugly, but your cooking's really something!
These are not made by me.
They are made by Marie-sensei.
Huh?
Even though she has her hands full taking care of Professor Stein,
she still worries about how we are doing.
I will make the person who did that to the Professor pay.
But first, I need to build up my strength.
Hey, why do not we pay him a visit?
If Crona comes with us, I think he will be really happy.
I need to go to the toilet!
Huh?
If you want to go then go alone!
I will stay here and eat.
Hey, hold it you...
I have not had enough yet!
What is wrong with them?
I cannot tell them.
There is no way I can tell them the truth.
Just like Ragnarok said,
I cannot stay here any longer.
You really are a good child.
You finally understand what you must do.
There is no place for you to return to, other than by my side.
Medusa-sama...
What are you doing?
Huh?
Dropping something so important.
Maka?
Erm...
Yes?
M-M-May I ask you something?
Of course!
You can ask me anything.
Erm...
About your mother...
Oh, right now, Mama is still a missing person.
M-M-Missing?
But occasionally, she sends me postcards.
Seems like she is on a journey around the world,
I wonder where she is right now...
Leaving a child behind and going missing?
This is too heavy...
What was she like?
Like someone you would see on the cover of a magazine.
The cover?
She is strong, still, even if she was angry at something you did, she would not raise her fist.
I guess she is the kind of person that makes you feel like she is calm and collected.
I find it impossible to imagine how she is like...
Then... what was the most memorable moment you had with your mother?
I would have to say the day when she got divorced.
Huuh?
That day, she was the coolest ever!
This is strange, this is really too strange, Maka.
Did I say something weird?
Uh... No...
Erm, so what do you think about your mother then?
I love her, of course.
Putting that aside, is it okay for you to not go to the toilet?
Yeah...
500 bags of concrete,
200 tons of metal,
and I also need 30000 of those 55mm diameter bearings.
It is urgent, so please have them sent to me as soon as possible
Are you planning to build a skyscraper?
From a small leak in a pipe to major construction,
if Shinigami-sama asks me, I will have them done.
You are just another one of those cunning people.
Oh,
there is one more thing that I need your help with.
Please tell me if you see Uncle Bob from that coffee shop.
I just cannot dance if it is not his Rumba Coffee.
There is also one thing I forgot to mention,
rather than sandals, I think it is better for you to wear safety boots.
I do not think it is that easy to change something that makes me unique.
Buttataki Joe,
just like the steam above his coffee cup,
he is a man one can easily understand.
Why is he the consultant?
Is it because he resembles Father in a certain way?
Making a fool out of everyone with their fake smile,
while never showing anyone their true faces.
Now it is perfect!
Exactly what the hell is this?!
It is a total mess!
Who the hell would play this kind of prank?!
Forget about that, we have lost him!
What?
Where has he run off to?
Stop doing that!
What a bunch of nosy kids,
they do not even know the taste of coffee and yet they want to know the truth.
When I arrived during my afternoon patrol,
it was already empty like this.
Maybe she left.
What are you saying?
Ever since she moved here,
she is been acting weird, has not she?
She always seems to be forcing herself to fit in.
Even when she was with us, she seemed to be in agony.
Do not tell me,
you did not notice?
Anyway, if this gets to Shinigami-sama's ears, it will be a big problem.
I must go find her.
Hey, Maka!
Geeze...
Running off like that without the slightest clue of where she might be...
Crona,
Where are you?
Where have you run off to?
Why?
I do not understand.
Saying that you left, it is a lie, right?
Crona...
Man am I glad,
Now we can carry on with our lives without ever seeing those gloomy faces again.
You too.
Once we get back to the hideout, you will totally forget about them!
I am not going back to Medusa-sama.
Huh?!
I just want to go to a place without any people.
There is no way a wimp like you can make it alone!
Make up your mind!
If you will not go back to Medusa then turn back to Shibusen!
Stop it, there is no way I can go back there, right?
Saying all those lies and still being treated so nicely...
That would only make me feel worse.
Shut up!
You idiot, do it before we have traveled too far!
Stop it.
Stop it.
I said, stop i...
Please forgive me, Arachne-sama.
Having your body beaten so badly while I was right there with you...
It is really inexcusable!
We have succeeded in persuading the Kishin to join us.
Rather than tears, I would expect some wine for celebration.
Certainly, please have this.
Everything on my end is settled as well.
Unfortunately, he got three of ours while they were taking him to his room.
He is just like a child left trembling alone in the darkness.
Before anything else, we will have to first make him comfortable.
Yuck!
How long do you intend to stay here?
We will become sun-dried anytime soon.
I do not want to go anywhere.
I can only stay calm in a place with nobody else.
I cannot do this anymore,
I am going to evaporate if this continues.
It is the same as that time,
the beach without sea.
We met at that sea-less beach.
Please be my friend.
You had the smell of the sun.
We are like the day and the night,
it was impossible for us to become friends from the very beginning.
It is all just a short dream.
It would be fine if I just forget all about it.
Crona!
Crona!
Are you sure it is really this way?
Yes, I can feel the presence of her soul.
Crona!
Maka...
Stop the bike, Soul.
Crona, I finally found you!
We will get you out of there right away.
Hey Soul, give me a hand here.
Why did you come here?
I never said I needed your help.
Go back.
Just go back!
Crona?
You do not even understand anything about me.
Just leave me alone!
I-I betrayed you.
I am the reason Professor Stein turned all weird.
I made Marie-sensei drink Medusa-sama's snake.
She did not even suspect it.
She even praised me for being a good kid.
She should not have cared for me.
Treating me so kindly,
trusting me like that...
Is she an idiot or what?!
Ridiculous!
You,
stay there.
Maka...
Hey!
If you say anything that bad about Crona again, I will never forgive you.
You are weak,
and you are excessively timid, but you always put others before yourself.
You always end up hurting yourself because of that.
Aside from that, I also know...
Crona, you laugh with the cutest face.
Medusa told you to do it, right?
You only did it because there was not any other choice, right?
Am I right?
Tell me that is the truth!
I could not tell her...
Huh?
Because she is my mother,
I could not tell her that I hate doing it.
But...
It hurts.
I do not want to hurt anyone anymore,
I do not want to make anyone sad!
I do not want to be separated from Maka!
I am weak,
that is why I might end up betraying you again.
I will not let that happen again!
I promise, I will not!
It is okay now, let us go back.
Now, we have two people down there.
How are you going to get back up here?
Geeze,
this is not cool at all.
Hmm...
I can understand how you feel,
but she signed this contract.
Anyone who violates this contract will be exiled.
It is necessary for us to do this to protect the order of the world.
But Crona knows what she did was wrong.
She said she wants to apologize to Marie-sensei and Professor Stein face-to-face.
Maka!
This is not something you can get away with by just apologizing.
Crona did something that she never should have.
I do not want to hear that from you.
Huh?
You are no different, all you did was break the promises you made to me and Mama.
How many times did you ask for forgiveness, saying that you would never do it again?!
You are not someone so unreasonable.
You should know the severeness of this case.
I do not know!
Such absurdity, I do not want to understand it!
It is not like Crona's really a bad person!
Hmm...
Shinigami-sama!
Huh?
A report just came in from security.
She has appeared.
She as in?
The mistress of all snakes...
Medusa.
Why are you here?
I have no intention of fighting.
I am here to surrender.
